name: ValoBox
overview:
eBooks anywhere. On demand. Pay-as-you-go.

ValoBox lets readers access paid content such as eBooks directly through their browser. Optimised for touch devices, ValoBox makes it possible for you to read books on any tablet, phone or PC with a modern web browser.

You can pay for the content as you go, buying individual chapters or even individual pages if you don’t want the whole book. The cost of any parts that you buy will be discounted from the price of the whole book.

Anything you buy is added to an online stash on valobox.com which can be accessed later, from any of your devices.

ValoBox enables any user to embed a books into other websites like a YouTube video. Anyone who shares or embeds a book receives 25% of the proceeds of resulting sales.
